attributes.additional_details:
That HM govt should urgently take all necessary steps to remove us from the cruel system of usury and interest debt.

These are immoral and a disease which impoverishes most and enriches the few. They are undemocratic and unjust and the current economic crisis which began in the US resulted directly from them.

No one is immune from this system and the IMF and World Bank embody it as well

HM govt like most is enormously in debt and the US debt is the biggest the world has ever known.

HM govt has a sovereign duty to free itself and our people from this failed, corrupt and outworn system, to hand us back our rights and free us of enslavement to the banks and financiers who wrongfully control us.

Petition wrongly rejected as duplicate

1   Often more than one petition on the site about the same issue

2   It addresses issue in different, comprehensive and clear way

3   Issue is vital and needs to be addressed  from more than one angle

As such not a duplicate
